      • Reading Group

      The reading group of Corinna Ulcigrai's research group

      Current organiser: Sophie Schmidhuber

      Future talks

      Unless marked otherwise, all talks are at 10.00 in H46.

      • 18/04/24   Sophie Schmidhuber,  Limit Sets of Non-orientable Mapping Class Groups II
        Reference: Sayantan Khan, The limit set of non-orientable mapping class groups
      • 25/04/24   Guest talk: Irene Pasquinelli,  Mapping class group orbit closures for non-orientable surfaces 1
        Reference: V. Erlandsson, M. Gendulphe, I. Pasquinelli and J. Souto, Mapping class group orbit closures for non-orientable surfaces
      • 02/05/24   Guest talk: Irene Pasquinelli,  Mapping class group orbit closures for non-orientable surfaces 2
        Reference: V. Erlandsson, M. Gendulphe, I. Pasquinelli and J. Souto, Mapping class group orbit closures for non-orientable surfaces

      Past talks

      Spring 2024

      • 11/04/24   Sophie Schmidhuber,  Limit Sets of Non-orientable Mapping Class Groups I
        Reference: Sayantan Khan, The limit set of non-orientable mapping class groups
      • 26/03/24   Chris Lutsko,  Perfect Retroreflectors and Billiard Dynamics
        Reference: P. Bachurin, K. Khanin, J. Marklof and A. Plakhov, Perfect retroreflectors and billiard dynamics
      • 21/03/24   Pouya Honaryar,  Introduction to Teichmüller Space of Hyperbolic Structures
        Reference: Benson Farb and Dan Margalit, A Primer on Mapping Class Groups
      • 19/03/24   Yuriy Tumarkin,  Cohomological Methods 2: Kontsevich-Zorich Cocycle
        Reference: Giovanni Forni, Effective Unique Ergodicity and Weak Mixing of Translation Flows
      • 14/03/24   Przemysłav Berk,   Ergodic Decomposition in Infinite Ergodic Theory
        Reference: Jon Aaronson, An Introduction to Infinite Ergodic Theory, volume 50 of Mathematical Surveys and Monographs. American Mathematical Society, Providence, RI, 1997.

      Autumn 2023

      • 28/11/23   Sophie Schmidhuber,   Geodesic and Horocycle Flows 3: Patterson-Sullivan Measure
        Reference: Barbara Schapira, Dynamics of Geodesic and Horocyclic Flows
      • 07/11/23   Yuriy Tumarkin,  Cohomological Methods 1: Number of ergodic measures
        Reference: Giovanni Forni, Effective Unique Ergodicity and Weak Mixing of Translation Flows
      • 25/10/23   Sophie Schmidhuber and Yuriy Tumarkin,   Geodesic and Horocycle Flows 2: Ergodicity and Mixing
        Reference: Barbara Schapira, Dynamics of Geodesic and Horocyclic Flows
      • 03/10/23   Sophie Schmidhuber,   Geodesic and Horocycle Flows 1: Topological Dynamics
        Reference: Barbara Schapira, Dynamics of Geodesic and Horocyclic Flows

      Spring 2023

      • 12/05/23   Frank Trujillo,   Hausdorff dimension of invariant measures of piecewise smooth circle homeomorphisms
        Reference: Frank Trujillo, On the Hausdorff dimension of invariant measures of piecewise smooth circle homeomorphisms
      • 31/03/24   Yuriy Tumarkin,  Bratteli Diagrams and Vershik Maps for IETs
        References:
        • Alexander Bufetov, Limit theorems for suspension flows over Vershik automorphisms
        • Kathryn Lindsey and Rodrigo Treviño, Infinite type flat surface models of ergodic systems
      • 24/03/23   Corinna Ulcigrai,   Regularity of Conjugacies Between GIETs and IETs
        Reference: Selim Ghazouani and Corinna Ulcigrai, Regularity of conjugacies of linearizable generalized interval exchange transformations
      • 17/03/23   Andrea Ulliana,   Invariant Manifolds for Hyperbolic Diffeomorphisms 2: Regularity of Invariant Submanifolds
        Reference: Michael Schub, Global Stability of Dynalmical Systems
      • 10/03/23   Andrea Ulliana,   Invariant Manifolds for Hyperbolic Diffeomorphisms 1: Existence of Stable and Unstable Manifolds
        Reference: Michael Schub, Global Stability of Dynalmical Systems
      • 03/03/23   Guest talk: Stefano Marmi,   Brjuno Functions
        Reference: S. Marmi, P. Moussa, and J.-C. Yoccoz, Some properties of real and complex Brjuno functions, In Frontiers in Number Theory, Physics, and Geometry. I, pp. 601–623. Springer, Berlin, 2006

        • P. Hooper, P. Hubert and B. Weiss, Dynamics on the inifinite staircase

      • 04/11/22   Corinna Ulcigrai,   Deviations of Ergodic Averages for IETs
